1:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  The first issue was published July 1981 and the last issue was published in July 1984.
Triplets:<Chromasette
2:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  Issues were published monthly.
Triplets:<Chromasette
3:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  While some references cite the price as having been $3.50 USD an issue, it was advertised in Creative Computing magazine in May 1983 as $45 USD a year for 12 issues, $25 USD for 6 issues, or $5 USD each.
Triplets:<Chromasette
4:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  The first issue contained 5 Basic programs and the "cover" of the electronic magazine (which had to be loaded onto a TRS-80 Color Computer and then run) was dynamic.

<Chromasette
8:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  In addition, they included advertisements.
Triplets:<Chromasette
9:
--------------------
Text: Chromasette:  Dave signed only his first name to the "CLOAD" and "Chromasette" letters.
